Name: Requiring that the preliminary MMR and the MMR contain a detailed explanation of the implementation of legislation passed by the Council.
Title: A Local Law to amend the charter of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that the preliminary mayor’s management report and the mayor’s management report contain a detailed explanation of the implementation of legislation passed by the Council.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the (by the request of the Comptroller)
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Paragraphs 3 and 4 of subdivision b of section 12 of the charter of the city of New York are hereby amended, and paragraph 5 is hereby added, to read as follows:
(3) an explanation in narrative and/or tabular form of significant changes in the program performance goals and measures from the adopted budget condition to the current budget as modified and from said modified budget to the preliminary budget statements; [and]
(4) an appendix indicating the relationship between the program performance goals and measures included in the management report pursuant to paragraph two of this subdivision and the corresponding appropriations contained in the preliminary budget[.]; and 
(5) a detailed explanation in narrative and/or tabular form of all efforts undertaken to implement legislation passed by the council since January 1, 2002, which shall include a separate section detailing all cases where efforts have not been undertaken yet to implement legislation passed by the council since January 1, 2002.
	§2.  Paragraphs 5 and 6 of subdivision c of section 12 of the charter of the city of New York are hereby amended, and paragraph 7 is hereby added, to read as follows:
(5) a summary of the procurement actions taken during the previous fiscal year, including: (i) for each of the procurement methods specified in section three hundred twelve, the number and dollar value of the procurement contracts entered into during such fiscal year; and (ii) for all procurement contracts entered into pursuant to a procurement method other than that specified in paragraph one of subdivision a of section three hundred twelve, the number and dollar value of such procurement contracts by each of the reasons specified in paragraph one of subdivision b of section three hundred twelve; [and]
(6) an appendix indicating the relationship between the program performance goals included in the management report pursuant to paragraph two of this subdivision and the corresponding expenditures made pursuant to the adopted budget for the previous fiscal year[.]; and
(7) a detailed explanation in narrative and/or tabular form of all compliance efforts undertaken to implement legislation passed by the council since January 1, 2002, which shall include a separate section detailing all cases where efforts have not been undertaken yet to implement legislation passed by the council since January 1, 2002.
§3. This local law shall take effect immediately.
